desc: This course provides students with the opportunity to gather insights and develop skills in the writing of creative prose, poetry and/or drama. Literary selections are often used as models and discussions of craft set the stage for the workshopping of student writing. For more information on this course please refer to: http://www.stolaf.edu/depts/english/courses/index.html
name: Creat Wrtg: Fict/Poet
title: Creative Writing I
